channel.title: Shops
channel.description: guys, im trying to make a shop take idfferent things than coins, how dod i do this? i already have a shop/npc set in my server to test it on but, it doesn't work ive added it to the places needed, post if you can help pl0x oh and when i click value it says both: (item)currently costs (value)[coins] (item)currently costs (value)[tokens] and i cant buy it unless i carry both the coins and tokens
